roleset.name: decode

example.name: corpus example
example.text: The work of Jean Francois Champollion -LRB- 1790 - 1832 -RRB- in deciphering hieroglyphics from the Rosetta Stone was an astonishing accomplishment

example.name: somewhat ambiguous
example.text: After I finally deciphered what the hell he was saying , I tried to ignore it .

propbank.arg: what the hell he was saying

example.name: decoded data as core, encrypted data as oblique
example.text: These people , with their quiet - smiling , quiet - frowning faces , connect one instantly with the stories out of the past that may be deciphered from the stained glass windows on the stair - landings which deal with various aspects of early days .

propbank.arg: the stories out of the past
from the stained glass windows on the stair - landings which deal with various aspects of early days

example.name: decoded data as oblique, encrypted data as core
example.text: the green view screen deciphered the message into readable text

roleset.note: DECIPHER-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on ULA. No VNcls. (from decipher.01-v)
Sometimes the thing being deciphered is somewhat ambiguous as to whether it is the start or end state-- default to arg1. see examples. (from decipher.01-v)
